§ 6909. Supplying steam or chilled water to Union Station complex The Architect of the Capitol may make agreements with the Secretary of Transportation to furnish steam, chilled water, or both from the Capitol Power Plant to the Union Station complex, at no expense to the legislative branch. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1202.)
